subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano interviewed for the coaching vacancy at Michigan on Wednesday but has yet to receive a job offer, according to a person briefed on the meeting.
snippet: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano interviewed for the coaching vacancy at Michigan on Wednesday but has yet to receive a job offer, according to a person briefed on the meeting.
